toc.value: Storing Data In Mysql with JPA
Starting the Application With Docker Compose

frontMatter.title: Spring Boot 3 Docker Compose Support
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: We will have a look at the new Spring Boot 3.1 feature supporting Docker Compose files on startup. No need to start Docker compose separately again

prev.title: Spring Cloud AWS 3.0 S3 with Spring Boot and Localstack
prev.author: Amrut Prabhu
prev.summary: In this article, we will look into how we can use Spring Cloud AWS S3 in a Spring Boot Application to communicate with AWS. We will run our setup with LocalStack to mock the actual AWS S3 service
